DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to confirm the findings of an early study with prostate cancer and to expand our knowledge of treating prostate cancer using an Adenosine-5'-triphosphate(ATP)inhibitor.
DOC.brief_title: Eradication of Prostate Cancer Using an Adenosine-5'-Triphosphate (ATP) Inhibitor
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of prostate cancer Referred to the study by their treating physician Any type of treatment before starting study
